text: I was flying over a calm ocean while a distant storm brewed. I felt free but a little afraid.
I was back in school, late for an exam. My teacher looked disappointed. I couldn't find my classroom.
A giant dog was friendly at first, then chased me through narrow alleys until I hid on a rooftop.
I kept trying to call my mother but my phone turned into sand. The city felt empty and blue.
I was underwater, breathing easily, following a silver fish through a door into a library.
